name: Christopher_Knight_Home_Dejon_Chevron_Fabric_Loveseat
reviews: I just had to have this. It makes the room pop with color and energy.
Perfect accent piece and easy to assemble! I purchased dark grey and used teal throw pillows. Yasss!
description:
As some spice and flavor to your life with the Christopher Knight Home Dejon loveseat. Available in select colors, this loveseat is sure to add that little something extra to your room. 
Includes: One (1) loveseatMaterials: Fabric, woodColor options: Orange, light blue, navy, or dark greyFinish: EspressoAssembly required: YesWeight: 43-poundsDimensions: 33.50 inches high x 50 inches wide x 31.50 inches deepSeat dimensions: 18.50 inches high x 50 inches wide x 20.75 inches deepFurniture Pattern: ChevronType: LoveseatStyle: Casual, ModernMaterial: Fabric, WoodAssembly: Assembly RequiredExact Color: Grey, Light Blue, Navy, OrangeColor: Blue, Grey, OrangeStyleCasual, ModernMaterialFabric, WoodTypeLoveseatAssemblyAssembly RequiredColorBlue, Grey, OrangeFurniture PatternChevron
